body_text:
Because navigator.plugins isn't actually an Array, it's a PluginArray. But I didn't actually test if that still works.
I could've used Array.from, but I somehow thought that Array.from wasn't available in the Firefox versions we care about, but looking at the docs, I was wrong. I'll see about fixing this up.
body:
Because navigator.plugins isn't actually an Array, it's a PluginArray. But I didn't actually test if that still works.

I could've used `Array.from`, but I somehow thought that `Array.from` wasn't available in the Firefox versions we care about, but looking at the docs, I was wrong. I'll see about fixing this up.
body_html:
Because navigator.plugins isn't actually an Array, it's a PluginArray. But I didn't actually test if that still works.

I could've used Array.from, but I somehow thought that Array.from wasn't available in the Firefox versions we care about, but looking at the docs, I was wrong. I'll see about fixing this up.
